content.raw:
Thanks for looking at the PR! Some answers:

* In general, `unique*.world` will often have conflicts, because they're generate from `unique.world.erb`. I wouldn't worry too much about them.
* There's no CI, no tests, big responsibility ;)
* On pull requests adding models, like this one, you can check to make sure the SDF makes sense, all parameters are reasonable, the files are correctly installed and usable...
content.html:
Thanks for looking at the PR! Some answers:

  • In general, unique*.world will often have conflicts, because they're generate from unique.world.erb. I wouldn't worry too much about them.
  • There's no CI, no tests, big responsibility ;)
  • On pull requests adding models, like this one, you can check to make sure the SDF makes sense, all parameters are reasonable, the files are correctly installed and usable...
